Package game.dinosaurs

Class Brachiosaur

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.dinosaurs.CapableActor
game.dinosaurs.DinoActor
game.dinosaurs.Brachiosaur
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ActorInterface
public class Brachiosaur
extends DinoActor
A herbivorous dinosaur that can eat fruits from trees, can destroy bushes and cannot be attacked by Allosaur.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static DinoEncyclopedia DINO_TYPE
    Enum type that can be referenced for a lot of useful constants that are values for Brachiosaur attributes.
    private static int nextId
    Id to append to a Brachiosaur's name to be able to differentiate between different Brachiosaurs.

  • Constructor Details

    • Brachiosaur

      public Brachiosaur​(DinoCapabilities sex, java.lang.Boolean isMatured)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      sex - DinoCapabilities.MALE is Brachiosaur should be male, DinoCapabilities.FEMALE is Brachiosaur should be female,
      isMatured - true if Brachiosaur is grown up, false otherwise.
